Title: The Greatest Musical Ever Written
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Annie Mebane, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: A school musical production creates strife between Adam and Barry while substitute teacher Beverly creates havoc in Erica's class on.
